–进入数据库

–密码：123456

–创建数据库

create database limn;

show databases;

–使用数据库表

use limn

–数据表使用样式

create table student
(
id int(5),
name varchar(12),
age int(12),
sex varchar(12)
)
;

–show查看数据表

show crease table student;

–DESC查看数据表

DESC student;

–网上书店

create table user
(
uid char(4) primary key not null,
uname varchar(20),
email varchar(20),
tnum varchar(15),
score int
);

create table category
(
cid int primary key not null,
cname varchar(16)
);

create table book
(
bid int primary key not null,
bname varchar(50),
buthor char(8),
price float,
publisher varchar(50),
discount float,
cid int,
constraint fk_book_catrgory foreign key(cid) references category(cid)
);

create table b_order
(
bid int not null,
uid char(4) not null,
ordernum int default ‘1’,
orderdate datetime,
deliverydate dateime
);

–学生选课表

create table studentinfo
(
sno char(8) primary key not null,
sname varchar(10) not null,
sgender char(2),
sbirth date,
scalss varchar(20)
);

–添加一条信息

insert into studentinfo(sno,sname,sgender,sbirth,scalss)
values(‘1001’,’zs’,’na’,’1999-1-1’,’wlw 1302’);

insert into
values studentinfo(‘1001’,’zs’,’na’,’1999-1-1’,’wlw 1302’);

–查询方式

select *from studentinfo;

–查询全部语句(定位查询)

select *from studentinfo
–select *from studentinfo
–where sclass =’物联网1902’

–删除数据

delete from studentinfo–表名称
where sno = ‘10101’;

–删除表

drop table studentinfo;

–删除库

drop database 学生选课 ;

–更改数据

update studentinfo
set sclass= ‘wlw1902’
where sgendder = ‘男’
